title: Has anyone proved that René Descartes was wrong? - Quora

response.answer_text: René Descartes had presented pure Rationalism Philosophy that works on deducted logic. In following quora answer, I deductive logically proved that pure Rationalism is wrong. Khuram Rafique's answer to Has anyone ever considered that knowledge is best sought by the simultaneous and balanced application of empiricism, rationalism, and mysticism?
